for_sales.sales_text:
I have upgraded from my Falmouth Bass Boat 16 (FBB16) to a Hunter Liberty 23 and though it saddens me, I am selling my Gunter rigged FBB16. Hull no 370. An excellent boat that is easily handled solo. Can be used as a day sailor, for taking the family up a canal or coastal, and is set up for fishing. An excellent all-rounder. Very easy to tow, with a displacement of about 300kg. For a detailed report on the boat, PM me.

Besides the standard setup:

  1. SSR registered
  2. Built-in buoyancy, so the boat is unsinkable.
  3. Dry forward and stern lockers
  4. Outboard
  5. Sails,
  6. Oars,
  7. Fresh anti-foul
  8. Electrics with assorted takeoffs including car cigarette lighter and USB sockets
  9. 100w solar panel with 50A controller and car battery
  10. Backup 20A controller
  11. 20w bilge pump
  12. Previous hand bilge pump included if wanted to refit.
  13. 12v LED Spotlights
  14. Easily removable splash deck
  15. fishing rod holders
  16. winter cover
  17. Mast up cover I have never used and can't comment on, as came with the boat.
  18. Road and launch trailer. Fully roller'd, so you can recover from dried out.
  19. New winch ribbon replaced May 2023
  20. Garmin Striker 4 fish finder, which includes sonar depth warnings and waypoints.
  21. Compass
  22. Laminated rudder and reinforced tiller
  23. Spare basic rudder blade
  24. Spare Gaff
  25. Spare mizzen available by separate agreement
  26. Sliding boom goose neck
  27. Anchor with chain and 200ft or so rope
  28. Replaced sheets etc.
  29. Bow fender
  30. Bow anchor roller
  31. Revarnished main mast and mizzen, booms, gaffs, rudder, and tiller last winter 2022/3
  32. Woodwork (benches, gunnel etc.) Danish oiled.
  33. Wheel clamp
  34. Set up for single or two-handed sailing, fishing and usable for cruising
  35. Ready to hitch up, drive away, launch and sail.

boat.full_description: I have added built in electrics with battery and 100w solar panel on a small, (easily removed) splash deck and lights. Recently spent 6 days on board in the Helston estuary, sailing and fishing. One day spent on a 7 hour round trip to the Falmouth Classic Regatta.
boat.name: Lulu
